headline: US High Growth Tech Stocks To Watch In December 2025
summary: As of December 2025, the U.S. stock market is experiencing a positive shift, with major indices like the Nasdaq Composite and S&P 500 nearing all-time highs, driven by optimism surrounding potential Federal Reserve rate cuts following favorable inflation data. In this environment of cautious optimism and shifting market dynamics, identifying high growth tech stocks involves looking for companies that demonstrate strong fundamentals and resilience amid economic fluctuations.

headline: ServiceNow Makes Major Multi-Year Investment to Enable AI Adoption at Scale Across Canada’s Public Sector
summary: TORONTO, December 08, 2025--ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW), the AI control tower for business reinvention, today announced a CA$110 million investment to enable Canada’s public sector to adopt AI at scale. The commitment includes building out Canadian-hosted, AI-ready digital infrastructure and operations, with advanced data, security, and operational controls, and increasing in-country expertise through a new Canada Centre of Excellence and approximately 100 new high-skilled, Canada-based jobs.
